    graphing - package graphing
     
    GRAPHING_SCREEN - Variable in class ui.DrawingSurface
     
    GraphingManager - Class in graphing
    Manages the graphing of stock data by maintaining the current dataset and delegating drawing tasks to GraphPlotter.
    GraphingManager() - Constructor for class graphing.GraphingManager
    Constructs a new GraphingManager with an empty data list and a default graph drawing rectangle.
    GraphingScreen - Class in ui
    The GraphingScreen class represents a screen that displays a graph with an animated gradient + stock-themed background overlay, plus pill-shaped, hover-scaled buttons for each action.
    GraphingScreen(DrawingSurface, AppController) - Constructor for class ui.GraphingScreen
    Constructs a new GraphingScreen instance.
    GraphPlotter - Class in graphing
    Responsible for rendering stock data and prediction graphs on a Processing sketch canvas.
